p: The investigation of these plants and their derived chemical compounds offers a different source of natural products, which could be a promising area of functional ingredient study. This type of processing is very sustainable in industrial production, as it has a secured market for the final product (food and pharmaceutical industry) and cheap raw material [ 37]. In this sense, during the production of passion fruit, cape gooseberry or pepino, some parts of the plant are usually disposed as waste, but could provide a source of income.
